name: Kung Fu Panda Quiz | Kung Fu Panda | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of Po's father?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Ping

	Mr. Ping is voiced by James Hong.  He is a goose that sells noodles.  The family has been selling noodles for centuries and he wants Po to someday take over the business.  Zeng is voiced by Dan Fogler, and is a messenger goose.

Master Shifu.

	Master Shifu is a red panda.  He is very short, and has big ears and a long mustache.  He is voiced by Dustin Hoffman.  He was the one who raised the main enemy of the movie.  The movie was released in theaters on June 6th, 2008.

questions.text: Which of the following is not a member from the Furious Five?
questions.explanation:
Shifu.

	Tigress appears to be the leader of the group.  She thinks she is the best and will be given the honor of Dragon Warrior.  She is voiced by Angelina Jolie.  The other members are Viper, voiced by Lucy Liu, Monkey, voiced by Jackie Chan, Mantis, voiced by Seth Rogen, and Crane, voiced by David Cross.  Shifu is their teacher, not a member.

questions.text: Who is the evil snow leopard that wants to be the Dragon Warrior?
questions.explanation:
Tai Lung.

	Tai Lung is an evil snow leopard that is trapped by Javan rhinos.  The jail is extremely heavily guarded, and Tai Lung is the only prisoner; however, when Zeng, the messenger goose, comes to give news that Tai Lung will soon escape, something terrible happens.  Tai Lung is voiced by Ian McShane.

questions.text: What method does Master Shifu finally use to teach Po?
questions.explanation:
Food.

	Master Shifu finds Po in the kitchen doing Kung Fu to eat.  He tells Po that there are cookies hidden on the top shelf, and leaves, but he doesn't leave completely.  He quickly runs back to the room to see Po doing the splits at the very top of the room.  Master Shifu then realizes he must use food to teach Po.  Po will do anything for food.

questions.text: What is Po fighting with when he says "Skidoosh?"
questions.explanation:
Fingers.

	When Po sits on Tai Lung's head, he says "Time to feel the thunder!"  He says "Skidoosh!" when he uses does the Wuxi Finger Hold.  He flexes his pinky and Tai Lung is destroyed.  Po is voiced by Jack Black.

questions.text: Who finally becomes the Dragon Warrior?
questions.explanation:
Po.

	Tigress is extremely mad at Po when he is first chosen to train as the Dragon Warrior.  Eventually, however, she comes to realize he is the true Dragon Warrior and congratulates him for it.  At first, though, she wants to prove she is worthy so she sneaks out to fight Tai Lung.  The other four members of the Furious Five join her in her attempt to fight Tai Lung.  Po is a panda bear that works at a noodle place with his father.  He loves Kung Fu, and dreams of it often.  He is late for the Dragon Warrior festival, so he falls from the sky using a rocket chair he made.

questions.text: What is written on the Dragon Scroll?
questions.explanation:
Nothing.

	Po is confused at first as to why there is nothing written on the scroll.  It is completely blank!  When he finally realizes what it means, he lets Tai Lung look at it, because he knows he will never figure it out.  What it means is that you don't need anything to be a powerful Kung Fu Master.  You are what makes you a master.

questions.text: What is the secret ingredient in Secret Ingredient Soup?
questions.explanation:
Nothing.

	Mr. Ping tells Po that there is no secret ingredient.  It is only special because customers THINK it is special.  This is what causes Po to realize what the Dragon Scroll means.

questions.text: What must be done to cause damage during the Wuxi Finger Hold?
options: Kick the enemy in the crotch
questions.explanation:
Flex your pinky.

	When the pinky flexes, the enemy is blown to pieces, to forever be destroyed.  This is how Po finally defeats Tai Lung.  As he does the Wuxi Finger Hold and flexes his pinky, he says "Skidoosh."
